name: Poppy has a Horrible Afternoon
description:
Poppy has a really bad afternoon when her girlfriend locks her in a rat maze.

This is a project made entirely for fun by TGDeerGirl; Digital Poppy had no hand in its creation, and neither did Freya C, or any of the other people featured in this game. Go play Poppy and Freya's games (I'm not sure why you're here if you haven't)!

Almost all art created by myself. Exemptions are several seconds from the song "Dogs" by Pink Floyd, and the song "Karkalicious" by Broadway Karkat. "Beach Soundscape 3 Sound" by Mike Koenig was used in the ending.

Note: The game doesn't close on it's own. Please hit Alt + F4 when you want to end it!
